Package bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model

Interface Node<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​VectorType,​IdentifierType>,​VectorType extends Vector,​IdentifierType>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeType - The node type that is defined for neighbors of this node.
    VectorType - The vector that is used to define the position of this node.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNode, AutomatonNode, DynamicProgrammingNode, GenericNode, GraphComplexNode, GridNode, MoleculeAtom, ReactionGraphNode, RegularNode
    public interface Node<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​VectorType,​IdentifierType>,​VectorType extends Vector,​IdentifierType>
    The node is the elementary object contained in graphs.

      • addNeighbour

        void addNeighbour​(NodeType node)
        Adds a neighbour to this node. This method should always be called in conjunction with adding an edge to the graph.
        Parameters:
